item.title: Bread and Wine
item.description: Bread and Wine “There always comes a time in life when the young men get bored by the bread and wine at home. They look for food elsewhere. The bread and wine of in inns at the crossroads can calm their hunger and thirst for a while. But man cannot spend all his life at the inns." Letting Go of Idealism I like this novel. I like Don Paolo. I live abstractly.

item.title: Running
item.description: Running I like to run… or maybe I like to jog. It doesn’t really matter. I like move a little faster than walking. My Goals When I run I just move. I don’t really think about what my goals are. I guess I try to be fast. I think this is wrong. What would I rather focus on? Breathing Avoiding injury Remaining balanced Adapting to the terrain Breathing I hold my breath when I run.
